website_summaries.verdict: Quality athletic socks that hold a secure shape.
pros: Owners love the quality, fit, and comfortable arch support these socks provide
We love that they hold their shape well, with no  shrinking
cons: A few felt sizing wasn't consistent (tending to run small) and some felt they were less breathable than other styles on the market

customer_reviews.title: Love these socks
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks. I have now purchased 6 sets. (i think i have sock fetish) fits good and snug, i do notice sometimes, not all the time, that the logo will be imprinted on the top of my foot at the end of the day. My shoes could be tied too tight, or i might get swollen, who knows.. I'm a real person and did NOT receive this item at a discount in lieu of a positive review. By clicking "helpful" at the bottom of this review, it will help move "real" reviews to the top. Thanks in advance.
customer_reviews.author: km in tx

customer_reviews.title: Not as Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: The photos show socks with under armour on the back of the cuff. The ones with the logo on the back have extra material that prevents the socks from slipping at the heal. These do not have that even though that is what is pictured. The manufacturer said they were in the process of updating their images. That was 4 months ago. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Brockway

customer_reviews.title: Very, very thin
customer_reviews.text: The ad for these socks did not mention that they were "liners". They are so thin, basically worthless.....like wearing nylons with tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: I really like these socks and I'm picky.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these socks and I'm picky. They aren't too thin or too thick. They stay in place, have great shape, have a little arch support, and feel secure on my feet. I have a cotton allergy, so these are one of the few kinds of socks I can wear. I also ordered the 'AirStep Women's No Show Athletic Socks', so I could pick which were best between the two. The others are not even close to the quality of these socks. Wish I would have just spent the few extra dollars and got more of these now.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I just love, love, love these socks! I run and do crossfit. I was a looking for a sock that is blister proof. These feel good and fit snugly without being tight. My feet stay cool and comfortable. I did get one small blister after a particularly difficult crossfit last night. I shudder to think what my feet would have looked like without these. Great quality and look they will really last. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Caralucy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Material...Pills Badly
customer_reviews.text: I abhore pilling on ANY fabric, and these pill terribly, before they are even washed. Also, the socks are quite thin, which didn't bother me quite as much as the pilling. Moreover, some of the socks feel a bit uncomfortable, as I can feel the seam inside the sock that runs along the toeline. Not worth the money, I would not repurchase or recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Quitters... and I was only standing in these socks :(
customer_reviews.text: Soft material and they feel smooth on my feet. That's where the pros end. I tried on two pairs and without even walking they just slid down. The ankles are way too wide, too loose from the get go, and do not have any significant elastic to hug your ankle and hold the socks in place. I can't imagine how bad they would be after a wash. Going back. UA has gone down hill big time and I'm buying less and less from this overpriced brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jane S W

customer_reviews.title: It is not seamless toe (or some of colors are not)
customer_reviews.text: I found these socks as "seamless tow" and select colors I want, as it is "Color selection", not "Model selection". What I get is not seamless toe socks. It is simple, ordinary socks. Now I see, that some colors have "seamless toe" mentioned, and some don't. I don't know, are these models different (and it is NOT color selection) or "seamless toe" in some descriptions is plainly wrong. It is not obvious form photos, too. Looks like all these socks are not "seamless toe", but. may be, some of them are. I'm not sure anymore. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Lev Serebryakov

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: This is a high end clothing line. I was hoping that their socks would be better than other brands. They are not. The fit varies from sock to sock with some of them being quite tight and others only just being ok fitting. this is after only a few washings. This is the same experience as with gold toe socks and cheaper socks from dept stores. I was disappointed. If you are expecting superior performance from this clothing item, you may be disappointed too. I still wear them. They seem to be holding up other than the inconsistent fit.
customer_reviews.author: ccas

customer_reviews.title: Bright fun everyday socks!
customer_reviews.text: Really it's the color of these socks that made me select them but it's really down to how comfortable they are that makes me recommend them. They feel nice on the foot, rather soft in texture but with a light compression that leaves my feet feeling energized and peppy. Since there isn't a heavy band at the ankle there isn't anything to cut off circulation or get tight around my calf or ankle the way some sporty socks can. These socks are fun to wear daily or at the gym, although they aren't really padded like you often see with gym or trail socks. They're fun and totally wearable depending on what you need a sock to do though.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Hoover

customer_reviews.title: thin
customer_reviews.text: I bought these, and there was a problem with the shipping, so I ordered a different brand. Then these showed up and comparatively, these are very thin and made for large feet. I am a size seven and these are big. Material is very stretchy. but the size itself is too big at what I assume was the size I was supposed to get. If you state you can fit FIVE sizes, you can expect that, I guess, but the other brand fits nicely, so why under armor is expensive is beyond me. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: camogram

customer_reviews.title: They Hurt!
customer_reviews.text: Huge seam across top of toe. Blistered my toes. Later I tried inside out. Still blistered my toes. These are the most uncomfortable socks I've ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Echo

customer_reviews.title: Great ankle socks that stay put at a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I have been looking for a low profile ankle sock that is thinner but doesn’t ride down. (Picky, right?) I try to walk 5-7 miles on my days off. So it’s very important for me to not have to stop every couple of hundred yards, bend down, fix socks, then continue on my way while grumbling about NOT GREAT socks. These are not those socks. They really do stay put!!! And enough cushion to be comfortable also. So definitely a repeat!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Your feet will thank you
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, great fit UA socks. I’m really picky about my socks and have smallish feet, so it’s hsrd to find socks that don’t gap or slip. These are perfect. Not too thick or thin, high or low. Black with just a cute touch of color so they work perfect with my black sneakers. Also comfy for sleeping, if you use socks at night. A good price for a bunch of pairs, not just 3 or 4. I plan to order more because I shared with my daughter, who also loves them. Great purchase for anyone, especially picky sock people 😉
customer_reviews.author: Tracy & Ashley

customer_reviews.title: NOT a seamless toe!
customer_reviews.text: Description states: "True seamless toe delivers superior comfort and reduced irritation" Absolutely NOT a seamless toe! Very disappointing since I love the colors, had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it if you're wanting extra comfort or support.
customer_reviews.text: These socks weren't for me. They fit great, but the way the heels are sewn makes it feel like you have pebbles or something in your shoes. They are very thin and slippery on hard floors. There is no extra cushion anywhere if that's something you need so it doesn't provide any additional comfort or support for active walking. I would say if you want socks that don't feel like you're wearing any, then these are for you.... But the weird sewing on the heels definitely feels like there's something. I would not recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and long wearing socks
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks. Thin, a little bit of compression. No show might be a bit of an exaggeration...perhaps "little show"? I also like that they dry super fast. They are pricier than a lot of socks out there? But I find the life wear of them to be excellent. I wear daily and I have some that are well over a year old that have yet to develop holes or bad spots on them (and I have been known to walk outside in them so that is saying a lot).
customer_reviews.author: California Faye

customer_reviews.title: Get off my toe!
customer_reviews.text: I have what I might call “sensitive feet“. What I mean by that is I don’t like to have a big lumpy seem hanging out around my toes... I turned the socks inside out and still the seam is pretty prevalent. I suppose it’s a mind over matter thing... They’re still not my favorite. And I guess this is not that important, but the colors in the image or not what you get. I got black socks, some with a gray decal, some with a red decal.
customer_reviews.author: AnnCarin

customer_reviews.title: Very thin, no arch support
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to tell by a picture how thick or thin a sock will be. I gave this three stars because it didn't meet my expectations, not because there was anything inherently wrong with the sock. "Thin" is relative to the observer. I thought the socks were very thin. Described as having "arch support". I could very faintly see some light banding around the middle of the sock, but there was no difference in feel. No compression or support. The socks are soft with nice soft colors. If you need a very thin sock, this might be for you. No idea how well they stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Socks were not the same as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I had bought these UA socks in the past from the store and love them. I needed some more in the dark grey colors, so I was excited to see them available here. What I received was not the same as what is pictured. First, I did not receive the colors as shown. I chose the gray pack. Instead of the two very dark gray pairs, I received two very light pairs. That was disappointing. The very light pairs are not even in the photo! Then, I noticed the Under Armour that is shown on the ankle of the sock in the picture, is NOT printed on the socks I received. I will not be ordering these from here again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not too thick or too tight
customer_reviews.text: Really like these mostly because they are not too thick and because they do not squeeze my foot. Easy to get on and off, wash well (so not come out of the dryer in little wads), and my feet can breathe in them. The heel does not ride down into my shoe when I walk for exercise. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I got these in May and one of them already has a hole in the bottom. I’ve maybe worn them 10 times and expected them to last a lot longer than 2 months. UPDATE: Within 4 months of purchasing these, half of the socks (6) had a hole in the bottom as pictured. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R.

customer_reviews.title: Sliding Off & Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn nothing but UA socks for the past 3 years since I first discovered them because they fit well, wicked sweat well, didn’t smell (much), and most importantly, NEVER slid down even after over 2 years of use. I ordered these at my usual size (I have bought over 4 dozen pairs) and they keep sliding down my ankle causing immense discomfort. Very disappointed in this lot but hopefully will have better luck next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and love the colors!
customer_reviews.text: I really like Under Armour, their quality of products is good and always consistent. I bought these socks to workout in and I love them! Super comfortable and bright colors are a nice pop. They are just the right height for me as I like no show socks, but a lot of the time they are either too high up on the ankle, or too low that they easily slide off my feet. They aren't cheap, but you definitely get what you pay for which is good quality socks!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Fran

customer_reviews.title: Great colors, nice fit, pretty durable (but they pill in the wash)
customer_reviews.text: These are nice socks. Vibrant colors, a cool UA logo and a heathered look. The only issue I have with them is their durability in the wash and while wearing outside of shoes (on their own). They are starting to pill in the wash and that's disappointing. On the good side, they have survived about 5-6 washes so far and are still in one piece. I wear them without shoes around the house on occasion and they are surviving that too. Socks don't seem to be of the same quality they were in the past. These have outlasted some of their peers thus far. So that deserves 4 stars for me. :D Love the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Diana de Avila

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, no holes or fading!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these socks a couple years ago and love them so much that I just recently purchased them again! They fit perfectly, don't make my feet sweaty, and hit the ankle at the right spot. The material is so good that over years they have not faded and even though I wear the same few pairs every day, they have no signs of thinning or holes! These are the ONLY socks that I buy. I have the black ones as well as the multi-colored ones. I will never buy another brand or style again!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE.
customer_reviews.text: NOT what you are used to. Same socks were bought two years ago and are much more thick...which means they will not get holes after running. These lasted 2 months and now have a hole around the big toe or heel. Under Armour seems to have cut costs and outsourced terrible materials like the other big brands. It was only a matter of time I guess. Thankfully we have high quality smaller brands available due to the rise of e-commerce.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Passmore

customer_reviews.title: great socks!
customer_reviews.text: I'm more of a flip flop type of girl (live in the south). I can not stand for my feet to get hot and sweaty. These socks are super soft and very breathable. They are thin (which i love). Great value for the price. I love the vibrant colors too. Highly recommend. These are probably my favorite socks.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Slide down heel almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand all these positive reviews!!! These socks slide down my heel almost immediately in any shoes I wear. Its the worst!!! For some reason, some of the colors have a shorter heel rise than others and stay up a little better. I threw out the pink ones because they were practically unwearable. The blue ones stay up a little longer. Too bad because I like the thickness of the material and they are comfy when not in shoes.
customer_reviews.author: K Fae

customer_reviews.title: Don't slip down when wearing short boots!
customer_reviews.text: These are great socks! I wear a size 9 shoe and they fit perfectly! I struggled with short socks slipping when I wore booties/short boots, and these stay in place perfectly! They're thick, but not too hot. And they're very soft & comfortable. Would definitely recommend and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Oxendale

customer_reviews.title: Great socks but wrong pair sent!
customer_reviews.text: I removed a star for the fact that I didn’t get the ones with UNDER ARMOUR written on the back of the sock. Other then that they are thick and soft, fit perfectly! Will purchase more but hopefully I get what I ordered next time. Hope this helps in your decision to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carley

customer_reviews.title: Durable comfortable running socks
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of these socks. I love them completely. They look brand new after 50 cycles in the washer (on cold) and dryer (on medium heat). They fit a little big but not too much...I'm a size 6-6.5 and bought a medium. They are great with running shoes (low on the ankle but high enough so the back of the shoe doesn't rub my ankle).
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Different quality than before
customer_reviews.text: So the first time I bought these socks back in 2018, they were the best socks I ever had. To this day, they're still my favorites but since I've lost a few pairs, I ordered more. The socks I received were not the same quality at all. They feel super cheap and extremely thin in comparison to the older ones. I'm super disappointed and will be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Maria McBride

customer_reviews.title: JUST OKAY
customer_reviews.text: I like Under Armour products but i really didnt care for this sock. It fits okl but.... it has a seam or something that i feel on the ball of my foot which bothered me.. Now i tried them in different shoes and got the same result. I will give them to a friend, but i ended up getting the gold toe plus which really fits my 9 1/2 - 10 foot alot better and are more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P

customer_reviews.title: So many pills!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are cute when you first get them and they are comfortabe but after about three washes, they have pilled up so bad you can’t even believe it. If your socks are going to stay hidden in shoes or if you are in the house and no one will see, I guess... but how embarrassing to have bright white socks that have black pills all over them!! Ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: If you don't want to wash whites, don't buy whites.
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would be a little Thicker like a pair of hanes socks I used to own (but can no longer find) so occasionally there will be some uncomfortable rubbing at the ball of my foot when doing things like parkour or krav maga. Otherwise super comfortable and breathable if I am wearing them casually. The colored logo ensures I'm not missing a sock in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money just for the brand
customer_reviews.text: These would've been great except they had holes in two pairs on arrival. The tabs holding them together must have put strain and instead of being in between the fibers, just made holes. Disappointing since they're fairly nice. Not as nice as other socks from UA...they're soft but cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: zachery a boltz

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not no-show!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are ok but they are not no-show. The top portion along with some of the stripes show in all of my athletic shoes. They would be no-show with hi-tops. I am disappointed with them. I guess I will go back to the Nike store where I can get truly no-show socks. I can't feel them support better than any other sock. They are comfortable so if you don't care whether or not they show maybe they're for you.
customer_reviews.author: Graycee

customer_reviews.title: Great material but a little big
customer_reviews.text: I love these! So comfortable, not too thick that they don’t fit well in sneakers etc.. the only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is because I wear a size 7 shoe and that’s the size range I got and they’re a bit big, they leave extra over the top of my shoes and much man who wear shoes size 10.5 could wear them perfectly. Otherwise great material and they actually look cuter in person than the picture!
customer_reviews.author: Kit Kat

customer_reviews.title: Slip off foot
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with these socks. One had a hole 1/4-inch big on top area. When wearing for a brief time, socks rode down all the way to toes--very uncomfortable. Very disappointed in quality. Would return them but I washed them first. Never had this happen to any of my other varied socks. Will not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MaryJ

customer_reviews.title: Decent socks but not superior for the price.  I prefer reinforced toes and heals with extra tight arch and this has none of that
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping the socks would be a bit thicker or at least reinforced at the toes and heels, but the fit is good and I don't think they will wear thin spots as quick as cheaper socks tend to. That said for the price I doubt I will buy them again. I think the price is a bit much for thin summerish sport socks. If they were thicker to provide more all around cushioning I would spend the money faithfully. It is so hard to find good socks at a decent price any more.
customer_reviews.author: Chasity Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great running socks!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are very comfortable. I have ran in them twice already (a total of 10 miles). My feet were not covered in sweat and no blisters! I have previously used new balance running socks that were very similar. With the new balance socks my feet would be drenched in sweat and I would get blisters. I 100% recommend these for runners! Plus the colors are very bright and fun! Also easy to sort out my running socks from my regular socks in my laundry!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice socks. I wear them at the gym mostly. They are low cut, and come to right about my ankle bone. Picture attached in my gym shoes for reference. You can’t really see them above the shoe. Thin, breathable, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great for workouts, but don’t wash well.
customer_reviews.text: I love that these don’t slide down as I’m walking and are lightweight, but they do pill very easily! After the first wash they had those annoying little balls all over them and keep getting worse with every wash. I even bought another pack in a different color, but they still do it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feel like cheap Walmart socks!
customer_reviews.text: These feel thin, cheap, and loose... like they'll fall off when worn with shoes. I randomly bought some under armour socks like these a couple years ago from Tj Maxx and they have lasted years and are my favorite low cut socks! They feel awesome and hug my feet in all the right places! So, I was excited when I saw them on Amazon, BUT I should've read the negative reviews first before purchasing! These def feel like knockoffs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I have small feet (size 5/6) and it's a challenge finding socks! Inevitable they end up with the heel of the sock somewhere up around my ankle - but not these! These fit perfectly and stayed put on my foot! I would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Fall down when you move
customer_reviews.text: I can wear these around the house or at night with no problem but as soon as they're inside a shoe they fall or get shoved down exposing my heel. They're form-fitting/tight but not uncomfortably so, I had high hopes for them because I like the look. I've tried them multiple times with my two different sneakers and the same result. Cute colors but I think they're not tall enough so they didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: They're thinner than I was expecting and they have zero support. They're just basic socks. I wanted something more like a higher end running sock.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stanton

customer_reviews.title: YOU WON’T BE DISAPPOINTED! GREAT SOCKS!
customer_reviews.text: This company MAKES THE BEST SOCKS! It’s like a hug for your foot. Never have I ever had a sock that fits so well and was so comfortable and supportive! I will buy again and again. This is my third purchase from this company. It’s all I will buy from now on. Try the striped ones too!
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: Really like these socks
customer_reviews.text: Really like these socks. They stay put on my feet and are comfortable. Update: I've had these for two months and they are already getting holes in them. Although they are comfortable, they are not very durable and not worth the price if they last for so little time.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Every pair developed holes at around 12 months.
customer_reviews.text: Every pair has developed holes on the footbed, all af the same time, in less than 1 year. I didn't change shoes, running styles, flooring, nothing I can think of to explain this. But every pair seems to have a lifespan of around 12 months and all decided to fall apart in the same spot at the same time. What a bummer, as they were super cute and comfortable. I may buy again to see if this was a one-off, but if it happens again, I won't trust this brand of socks going forward.
customer_reviews.author: LYNZ

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT true Under Armour
customer_reviews.text: I've tried for different pairs from this set and each one of them slips off my heel while I'm walking. The socks do not fit snugly and comfortable the way real UA socks do. These are a cheap knockoff and not the real deal. Don't waste your money!! They're not even worth half the price
customer_reviews.author: Marlena A.

customer_reviews.title: YES! Love Under Armour.
customer_reviews.text: We love Under Armour in this household. I've been looking for quality socks for myself, since all of my boys have Under Armour socks. I picked this pack on Amazon because they were a deal of the day, and priced fairly. I was a little concerned about the sizing. I got this pack of assorted colors and the size was "medium" which reads shoe size 6-10. I wear a size 11 but just figured socks stretch so I'll take the chance. I was right. They fit my big ol feet perfectly and comfortably. They keep them warm in this cold Wisconsin winter. When I open my sock drawer, these are the first pair I go for before any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: 911Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: not sure what's up with these
customer_reviews.text: I've bought Under Armour socks in the past that lasted forever, unfortunately these socks already have thread unraveling and I haven't even worn them yet - I just got them and washed them in cold water on the delicate cycle and put them on low heat in the dryer and they came out as if I had worn them a bunch....
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Nice socks.
customer_reviews.text: I've been replenishing my sock drawer because my old socks started crackling when I picked them up (that's how you know it's time). I've been buying various brands, styles. These are one of my favorites so far. Colors are quite nice, and the socks are comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Babykitty

customer_reviews.title: I got rid of all my socks and only bought these
customer_reviews.text: These are my absolute favorite socks! They are extremely well made. I had bought this product years ago at the store and loved them so much but couldn't find them at the store again so I was very happy to find them at Amazon. They do not wear out or become warped or stretch. I also like that they are not extremely thin or extremely stretchy like cheap socks. No complaints overall!
customer_reviews.author: TaySimon

customer_reviews.title: Socks keep your feet dry and do not slip
customer_reviews.text: This is the only sock I have found that does not slip around inside my shoes. The sock is thinner and not as "soft" but for me the most important issue is not slipping when I am working out/running/dancing. Some of the soft fluffy socks are also warm, so a cooler sock that protects my feet is the most important quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fabric causes sweaty feet
customer_reviews.text: These are the first pairs of socks I've ever had that made my feet sweat and caused stinky feet...perhaps because of the type of fabric, these socks are more "spandexy" and less "cottony" than most socks that keep the feet dry. The feel of the fit is great because they really hug the foot but I'm going back to fruit of the loom...
customer_reviews.author: ladybug74

customer_reviews.title: The most important thing is - they stay put in your shoe, and don't fall down!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had such bad luck buying these. They look great, fit nice - then you put your shoes on, walk out of the room, and they slide down under your foot into the shoe. NOT THESE!!!! They stay up, and they are comfy. When I need more, I shall buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Lady~J

customer_reviews.title: My favorite socks!
customer_reviews.text: These are my all-time favorite socks! I wear them with my casual tennis shoes around town, while working out, just because while I'm chilling and watching movies, while sipping tea on the deck overlooking the town below, etc. They're great. Comfortable. Cute.
customer_reviews.author: RGrayless

customer_reviews.title: However these socks are SUPER warm, and my feet do not get sweaty ...
customer_reviews.text: I wished these came in a size small on amazon. I have small feet (size 6.5 shoe in Under Armour and Nike) and these are a little big on me. However these socks are SUPER warm, and my feet do not get sweaty with these even after being at the gym. I typically hate socks because of my feet getting sweaty and these prevent that.
customer_reviews.author: LaRissa

customer_reviews.title: The only workout socks I have bought that don't fall down
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it is my feet or these socks, but the don't fall down. I found this at a DSW and then reordered on Amazon. They are the same socks. I found that the toes get a hole in them but I wore them for about a year and that was fine with me because I worked out a lot. So these were worth it to me. I can't stand a sock that falls down.
customer_reviews.author: MewerSoda

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not great
customer_reviews.text: They feel nice on but they do make my feet sweat a bit. They also look like they will pill and not last long. I washed them once and they were already a little fuzzy. If they were cheaper they would be fine but at this price, I think it should be higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa

customer_reviews.title: 6 Under Armour Socks
customer_reviews.text: Shipped and received these socks fast! Out of the 6 pairs received, (1) one of the socks had a hole in it see pictures. Not too about this at all! These are thin socks, good for working out inside the house or inside a gym but I wouldn’t recommend these in cold weather due to the sock being thin.
customer_reviews.author: Julie D Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Does not slide under heel while walking or working out. Thin but my daughter likes it that way. Not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Ondokusan

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality! Save your money!!
customer_reviews.text: Not the quality I expect!! I bought these because I figured they were a good brand so they would be good quality. Each pair got a hole in them the first time I wore them!! I don’t wear sox often so it was too late to return them when I realized they were all poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: snowy

customer_reviews.title: Good socks, did not get what I ordered though.
customer_reviews.text: While I received black under armour socks, the assorted colors do not match the picture shown. I got two reddish pink, two grey, and two black logos instead of rainbow logos. A little disappointed, but they’ll do the job the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: Being a mountain biker, I wear my socks hard. It's hard to find socks that truly wick away moisture that aren't super thick. These work perfect. I've had them for about 8 months now and there's no fading, no rips. They stretch back into place and are overall, great socks. I'll be purchasing more. The only thing is - not that it's a big deal is the photo shows the back having the brand name written, mine don't. They may have changed the style a bit.
customer_reviews.author: w_271956

customer_reviews.title: Don't Stay Up
customer_reviews.text: I expected more given the UnderArmor brand. The material is good quality, the fit is fine, but they DO NOT stay up. I thought maybe it was the shoe, but I tried them in another pair and they still slid down into a ball under my foot. Sorry I bought them, will suck it up and pay more for Bombas that actually stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Ccoregon

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as other UA I’ve purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this brand before and they are they best socks I’ve ever had. These however, are NOT the same quality. These slip off my heel constantly. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Schovajsa

customer_reviews.title: A bit too thick
customer_reviews.text: I love UA products, and these socks wear well. I wish they were a bit thinner, but I don't wear them in the summertime they are a little too hot. They don't fall down or move when I am exercising which is why I will continue to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: C Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are terrible! I've thrown most of the pack of socks away because they don't stay on your feet. Over the course of a day, I was constantly pulling them back on my feet. They roll down and off your feet and hang around your toes. What's the point of wearing these socks?
customer_reviews.author: D. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Sizing misrepresented
customer_reviews.text: I returned the socks. I wear a size 10 shoe. The sizing on the website said that these socks went up to size 10. However, the package read that the socks were up to size 9. I was looking for no shows that would not slip down in my shoes. On the plus side, returning the socks was an easy process.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: A tad small, but comfortable & durable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased a pack of these socks before & they’ve become my everyday socks. The current ones I bought are a little smaller than the others. I’m only a shoe size 7.5, but these tend to slip off my heel depending on what shoes I’m wearing. They are durable & comfortable though.
customer_reviews.author: L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Not what they say they are
customer_reviews.text: They definitely not comfortable and they made way to small and definitely made cheap..I don't even know if they under armour but be using the logo for them..don't waste your money on these..I am returning these asap
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hess

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: More than half of these socks were totally stretched out at the ankle, making them unusable. There is a sticker saying "slightly irregular" on the packaging but the Amazon description does not mention this fact. Immediately returned. Wishing that I could give this item less than one star!
customer_reviews.author: Birthday Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Nice socks, but not liners
customer_reviews.text: The product is defined as no-show liner socks. However, these are not liners as I would understand a liner to be. A liner for hiking purposes is a tight sock that sits underneath a secondary sock. These are full fledged socks. That said, the colors are fun and the socks fit well, so we decided to keep them, despite the fact the title description is a little misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Steven G.Top Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfy. Bought to wear with black sneakers. Perfect. Under Armour.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: These socks are comfortable and a perfect fit. However, what I received did not match the advertised picture. I ordered the ones with "Under Armour" on the cuff, but it's missing this. If you read the questions, 6 months ago the seller said had removed this feature and they were updating the images to prevent misleading consumers, but they still have not done this. This is the only reason I'm giving them 3 stars. It's not hard to ensure your ad images are accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Z.

customer_reviews.title: High quality comfortable socks!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are perfect in every way. I love the colors and how they don't fade after washing. They are so comfortable and of high quality. I would order more in different colors if they were available.
customer_reviews.author: HAEJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly thin and fitted!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very picky with socks. I like thin, low, fitted socks and these pretty much nail it. They are just the tiniest bit lose but I barely wear an 8 and have skinny feet. My niece actually has the same socks and love them as well. She wears at least a 10 and they fit her perfectly! I would definitely recommend these if you like thinner socks.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal

customer_reviews.title: Run small - I wear women's shoes size 9 and they barely fit
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable socks, but they do not do much "breathing." I wear a women's shoe size 9 and these barely fit me; I don't have wide feet, either. They run pretty small. I wore a brand new pair to Disneyland all day and my feet were comfortable in my tennis shoes all day; however, when I finally got home and took my shoes off (which are pretty new) my feet were more stinky than normal- this fabric doesn't breathe! My husband's men's Under Armour socks aren't like this. I don't think I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa ZZ

customer_reviews.title: Breathable, non-slip sock
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women’s 11 shoe. I don’t like the bigger socks because then there’s “extra” at the toe or the heel. These socks go over my heel but stay real low. Some might say they are too small, to me they are perfect! They are snug yet breathable. And they don’t move and fall off my heel when I’m doing cardio and side-to-side jumps/moves. They hold up well to washing. I’ve had a hard time finding socks I like recently but these are great!
customer_reviews.author: arica

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: These are thin and comfortable socks that are great for working out or just wearing around the house. I wish they would make a pack that has all gray because I would definitely get those too.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Been using them for months now and love them. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good socks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I figured that an under armour brand sick would provide the snug fit around the center of the foot. These do not do that. I like these socks and they are still super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in these socks. Typically love UA products but these socks are very thin and actually run on my feet. I have gotten blisters on the bottom of my feet from wearing them with shoes. They are not soft or padded in any way and don't wear well. Definitely can't be worn while running or working out, but really best only to wear without shoes. I would not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Pulitano

customer_reviews.title: Fuzz ball central
customer_reviews.text: These seem like nice socks. But after the first wash they are covered in fuzz balls. You can’t get them off. I only find this problem with under armor socks.
customer_reviews.author: C & B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. I love under Armour gear and have never had any sock issues with any brands but the inner seam on these socks is very rough and irritating. Super bummed these don’t stand up to brand expectations
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Great socks...except they aren’t as pictured. In the image the words under armour are on the back top of ankle of sock. Mine came blank. I’ll still wear the heck out of them but just FYI. Because I would have gone with a different color scheme had I known this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Highly comfortable. I wear this every day for my running or workout. The only thing is that these are low covering socks so if you have high trainers going upto your ankle then your shoes will touch your ankle and you might end up bruising. Good with low ankle shoes
customer_reviews.author: Nabiha Khan

customer_reviews.title: Heal slips under, instep rubs! Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because the picture shows it rides high in the back and instep. They do not. If walk alot, wear sneakers, and need a sock that guards against rubbing it or heal slipping, this is not a good choice. Unfortunately, I already one pair, one time, and realized my error. They're going to Goodwill?
customer_reviews.author: jani cramp

customer_reviews.title: Keep feet dry!
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks! We live in a very hot, humid environment, and it is hard to find socks that keep your feet dry. These are light and comfortable. I bought two packs and wear them every day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but slip
customer_reviews.text: These socks are very soft and comfy but are always slipping down/off when worn with sneakers which is not great when walking or running. I can only use them to walk around the house.
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The opening of the sock does not stay on very well. It’s like the elastic is gone and it’s causing them to ride down when you’re walking. I was expecting better quality considering the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kori

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for, don’t change a thing!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t change a thing about these socks! They’re so comfortable, they don’t squeeze my toes like the last pack of socks that I bought and they’re really well made. I’ll definitely be buying these again when I need another pack.
customer_reviews.author: Felishia Rae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a picky teenager.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has a hard time finding socks that don't fall down with her work out shoes. These do not fall down and are the perfect thickness to be comfortable but not too hot. They are tight but a very comfortable tight not a painful tight.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Abu

customer_reviews.title: which is good OR bad depending on what you're used to
customer_reviews.text: Socks are thin, which is good OR bad depending on what you're used to. Green pair got a hole in it after first wear, but the others are still fine. Not as no-show as I was hoping, especially since they are colorful... but comfy.
customer_reviews.author: OntheGo

customer_reviews.title: They don't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a little over 7 months ago. I don't wear them every day and when I do I wear them with athletic shoes. So between a 6 pack and not wearing them every day they should be in decent shape. They aren't falling apart but they don't stay in place. They slip below my heel and get worse as the day goes on. Maybe they're good to wear around the house which is why I give them a 1 rating. Other than that, I regret buying something that is not useful.
customer_reviews.author: JessesGirl

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Socks Ever
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these socks, they compress in the middle which is my favorite thing about them! Keeps them from slipping off my feet and also adds support, love love love how they feel and how long they last! This is my second pack that I’ve purchased, I had the multi colored ones before and they’ve lasted me two years before finally starting to wear out and fade and get holes. Definitely going to be routinely buying these every year. Good to wear with my work out shoes...winter boots, Nike sandals, and my everyday adidas sneakers. These are so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Thonsgaard

product_meta.title: Under Armour Women's Essential No Show Socks, 6-Pairs
product_meta.description: Under Armour brand mission is to make all athletes better through passion, science and the relentless pursuit of innovation. Today's athlete demands a sock that not only represents the look and feel of the brand, but that simultaneously provides useful, technical attributes bridging the gap between style and functionality.
feature_bullets: Flat knit conforms to foot for superior touch and feel
Dynamic arch support helps reduce foot fatigue
Material wicks sweat and dries fast
Anti-odor technology helps prevent odor in the sock
